title: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected
description: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? The output is "MySomeClass".
OB: The current output is "MySomeAnn", but I expect the output to be "MySomeClass". This behavior is not consistent with Servlet 3.0 spec. My code works fine on Glassfish 3.0.
EB: The expected behavior is that if a web application configures a custom name for its session tracking cookies, the same custom name should be used as the name of the URI parameter if the sessionid is encoded in the URL (provided that URL rewriting has been enabled).
